articles.title: Stocks hit all-time highs as US economy grows faster than expected
articles.summary: Stocks hit all-time highs after the US economy grew faster than expected during the latest quarter, boosted by strong consumer spending and big investments in artificial intelligence that eased concerns about the effects of Trump's tariffs.
articles.translated_title: Stocks hit all-time highs as US economy grows faster than expected
articles.translated_summary: Stocks hit all-time highs after the US economy grew faster than expected during the latest quarter, boosted by strong consumer spending and big investments in artificial intelligence that eased concerns about the effects of Trump's tariffs.

articles.title: Elon Musk’s xAI launches Grok-Code-Fast-1, a free agentic coding model to rival OpenAI and Microsoft
articles.summary: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is moving into the coding space. On Thursday, the company released a new agentic coding model called grok-code-fast-1, a tool it describes as “speedy and economical.” The release marks xAI’s push into one of the most competitive frontiers in AI: building assistants that can write and manage code. The

articles.title: Dell lifts annual forecasts on AI server sales boom
articles.summary: Dell Technologies raised annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, buoyed by demand for its artificial intelligence-optimized servers that are powered by Nvidia's advanced chips.
articles.translated_title: Dell lifts annual forecasts on AI server sales boom
articles.translated_summary: Dell Technologies raised annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, buoyed by demand for its artificial intelligence-optimized servers that are powered by Nvidia's advanced chips.

articles.title: Dell Raises Annual Forecasts on Strong Demand for AI Servers
articles.summary: Dell Technologies Inc. boosted its annual outlook and posted quarterly sales and profit that topped analysts’ estimates, building on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers that power an expanding fleet of data centers.
articles.translated_title: Dell Raises Annual Forecasts on Strong Demand for AI Servers
articles.translated_summary: Dell Technologies Inc. boosted its annual outlook and posted quarterly sales and profit that topped analysts’ estimates, building on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers that power an expanding fleet of data centers.

articles.title: Musk's xAI forays into agentic coding with new model
articles.summary: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup, xAI, on Thursday released a new "speedy and economical" agentic coding model, marking its entry into a key focus area for AI companies.
articles.translated_title: Musk's xAI forays into agentic coding with new model
articles.translated_summary: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup, xAI, on Thursday released a new "speedy and economical" agentic coding model, marking its entry into a key focus area for AI companies.

articles.title: Microsoft tests MAI-1-preview AI model boost to Copilot, rival OpenAI
articles.summary: Microsoft wants to depend more on its own internally built artificial intelligence models for Copilot, which is available in Bing and Windows 11.
articles.translated_title: Microsoft tests MAI-1-preview AI model boost to Copilot, rival OpenAI
articles.translated_summary: Microsoft wants to depend more on its own internally built artificial intelligence models for Copilot, which is available in Bing and Windows 11.

articles.title: Modesto school district launches committee to focus on how AI should be used in classrooms
articles.summary: Modesto City Schools has launched a 20-member committee focused on how artificial intelligence should be used in classrooms.
articles.translated_title: Modesto school district launches committee to focus on how AI should be used in classrooms
articles.translated_summary: Modesto City Schools has launched a 20-member committee focused on how artificial intelligence should be used in classrooms.

articles.title: Sen. Blackburn Among Time's Most Influential in AI
articles.summary: Sen. Marsha Blackburn, R-Tenn., was named to Time Magazine's list of the 100 Most Influential People in Artificial Intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Sen. Blackburn Among Time's Most Influential in AI
articles.translated_summary: Sen. Marsha Blackburn, R-Tenn., was named to Time Magazine's list of the 100 Most Influential People in Artificial Intelligence.

articles.title: Study shows AI can hone in on genetic risks for 10 inherited diseases
articles.summary: Researchers say they've trained artificial intelligence models to assess genetic risks for 10 inherited diseases on a spectrum rather than simply "yes/no."
articles.translated_title: Study shows AI can hone in on genetic risks for 10 inherited diseases
articles.translated_summary: Researchers say they've trained artificial intelligence models to assess genetic risks for 10 inherited diseases on a spectrum rather than simply "yes/no."

articles.title: Nvidia forecasts decelerating growth after two-year AI boom
articles.summary: Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable company, gave a tepid revenue forecast for the current period, signaling that growth is decelerating after a staggering two-year boom in artificial intelligence spending.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia forecasts decelerating growth after two-year AI boom
